fields.text: A unique aura available only to Rangers
Grants Faster Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Attack Rating to allies
Magically splits one arrow into many, unleashing a deadly arc of quivers
Uses the same skill as zon; can also benefit from it's synergies
Unleashes waves of frozen arrows from the sky in a large targeted area
Uses the same skill as zon; can also benefit from it's synergies
Shoots an arrow that creates a fire trail and unleashes a meteor strike on impacted enemies
Uses the same skill as zon; can also benefit from it's synergies
Magically splits one arrow into many, then targets multiple nearby enemies
Uses the same skill as zon; can also benefit from it's synergies
Imbue your missiles with such force, that they pierce through enemies.
Uses the same skill as zon
